body: Tried filming a #timelapse of last night’s #sunset. What do you think? #naturephotography #sky

comments.body: Wow, that turned out beautifully! The colors are incredible. What did you use to film it?
@45454 Thanks! I just used my phone, believe it or not! Had it on a tripod and used a time-lapse app.
That’s so calming to watch. Did you add music to the video?
@56565 Yeah, I added a little soft piano music to match the vibe. It really brings the whole thing together!
I love how the clouds are moving! How long did it take to capture that?
@67676 It took about an hour in real time, but the time-lapse condenses it down to just a minute or so!
I’ve always wanted to try making a time-lapse! Any tips for beginners?
@78787 Definitely use a tripod to keep the camera steady, and make sure to pick a scene with a lot of movement, like clouds or traffic.
This looks amazing! I can’t believe you got this on your phone. Any plans to film more time-lapses?
@89898 Thanks! I’m hooked now, so I’m thinking of doing one for a sunrise next time. Should be fun!
